<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Smash from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=1731) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 127 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Cut from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=1729)

</column>

---

Your expertise enables you to knock away spells. You can use [Cut from the Air](/Feats.aspx?ID=1729) against ranged spell attack rolls.
name: Smash from the Air
